getContentType

public static java.lang.String getContentType(java.lang.String aFilename,
                                              java.lang.String aDefaultType)
Given a filename, return the appropriate content type. If the type is not found, then the default value is returned.

Parameters:
aFilename - file name
aDefaultType - default content type.

getContentTypeFromExtension

public static java.lang.String getContentTypeFromExtension(java.lang.String aExtension,
                                                           java.lang.String aDefaultType)
Given a file extension, returns the appropriate content type. If the type is not found, then the default value is returned.

Parameters:
aExtension - file name extension
aDefaultType - default content type.
